feed.title: Developing Brains in Context Lab
feed.subtitle: The Developing Brains in Context Lab at the University of Oregon

entry.title: Flux 2020 presentations!
entry.content: Members of the DBIC lab presented at this year’s virtual Flux 2020 conference! Check out Lucy’s poster presentation and Elizabeth’s poster presentation. Kate helped organize and facilitate the pre-conference workshop on using Neuropointillist in the cloud, and you can access the tutorial here.
entry.summary: Members of the DBIC lab presented at this year’s virtual Flux 2020 conference! Check out Lucy’s poster presentation and Elizabeth’s poster presentation. entry.title: New lab website
entry.content: We are so thrilled to have a new website, developed and designed by the inimitable Jonny Saunders.
entry.summary: We are so thrilled to have a new website, developed and designed by the inimitable Jonny Saunders.
